alert.note: Alert for Northeast Bighorn Mountains; Sheridan Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 14 at 10:44PM MST until February 15 at 3:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow occurring. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Northeast Bighorn Mountains and Sheridan Foothills. * WHEN...Until 3 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on reduced visibility and slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds and most intense blowing snow will occur over southern Sheridan County.
info.instruction: Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
